snippet.title: Code Alkonost - Official Launch Trailer | Dive into the Dark Fantasy Slavic Mythology World
snippet.description:
Code Alkonost Release Announcement
🎉 We’re thrilled to announce that Code Alkonost will launch this January! 🌟 Get ready to dive into the world of Slavic mythology, dark fantasy, and psychological horror.

🔍 What to Expect?
🎥 Our brand-new trailer showcases:
🏞 Mystical landscapes and eerie dungeons.
🗝 A glimpse of puzzles and survival mechanics.
🎶 Authentic music to immerse you in this dark and captivating world.
🚨 Prepare for a journey between the worlds of Jawia and Nawia, where your courage and choices will determine the fate of humanity.

🔜 Follow us for more details on pre-order bonuses and exclusive content!

🔗 Watch the trailer and join the adventure: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2062030/Code_Alkonost_Awakening_of_Evil/

🎵 Music Credits:
"Listopad" - Composed and performed by Losev Andrey Valentinovich and Pobuzhanskaya Ksenia Ilyinichna. Used with permission.

#CodeAlkonost #SlavicMythology #DarkFantasy #IndieGames #PsychologicalHorror #Rusalka #GamingRelease #MythologyInGames #GamingCommunity #AlkonostMusic
